Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-39325 affecting package moby-containerd for versions less than 1.6.22-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-39325 affecting package moby-containerd for versions less than 1.6.22-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-containerd is earlier than 1.6.22-2, affected by CVE-2023-39325
